group_1.textRight: What are you reading today, Kira?

group_1.textLeft: ...You're always asking me that question.@Any particular reason why?

group_1.textRight: I wanna know what mode you're in right now.
Like how a while ago, you got so deep into waka@poetry...
That you started carrying paper strips and an@inkstone with you...
And you had a pretty severe case of classic@rakugo mode until just the other day, right?
You ought to be in foreign literature mode right@now, so... Borges?

group_1.textLeft: I've been having another renewal of my love for@Japanese modern literature lately...
So I'm reading the collected poetry of Rimbaud,@for instance...

group_1.textRight: Wait, but you just said *Japanese* modern@literature?

group_1.textLeft: It's ChÅ«ya Nakahara's translation, so it fits my@personal definition of the category.

group_1.textRight: As eclectic a diet as ever, huh.

group_1.textLeft: I dare say you're in the same boat...

group_1.textRight: Yeah. I suppose I'm too fickle to settle on one@area of expertise either.
Did you figure out what properties your magic@has, after that?
All three of us became Magical Girls at the same@time...

group_1.textLeft: ...And yet Mihono's the only one whose specialty@magic we've figured out.

group_1.narration: This is Mikura Komachi:@my classmate at Kosho School, and childhood friend.@She's an honor student with a love of history.
Seeing as I'm an avid reader,@we often encounter each other at the library.
Both of our homes are located outside Kamihama,@and we met Kyubey near the outskirts of the city.
We became Magical Girls there,@along with our film-loving underclassman Seira Mihono,@who happened to be there at the same time...
First was Komachi, whose love of history led her@to pour her passion into Kamihama's@local historical research.
Then Mihono, whose love of film had inspired her dream@of becoming a film director one day.
I watched as each of them became a Magical Girl,@offering up exactly the sort of wish you'd expect them to...

group_1.textLeft: And finally, Temari Kira.@What will your wish be?
